### Best: Logistic Regression
| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| PR-AUC | **0.892** |
| F1 | 0.909 |
| Recall | 87.7% |
| Precision | 94.3% |

### Top Features
| Feature | Weight |
|---------|--------|
| realized_vol_300s | 0.34 |
| realized_vol_60s | 0.29 |
| log_return_300s | 0.16 |
| spread_mean_300s | 0.09 |

### Hyperparameters
**Logistic:** C=1.0, l2, balanced
**GradBoost:** n=100, depth=5

**Training:**
- 5-fold CV
- GridSearchCV
- All CPU cores
